name: Forestspirit
description:
-This game was made for the GMTK GAME JAM 2020-

I made this game all by myself under 48 hours!!

-Controls-

"a,s,d" to move

"w or space" jump

"J or LeftMouse" to attack

-Theme-

Out of control, this theme was hard my game focuses on the theme story wise

that you are a spirit of the forest that tries to stop a corruption going out of control.

-Gameplay-

This is platformer with combat inspired by hollow knight.

-Code-

Wuzzywizard

-Music/Sounds-

Wuzzywizard

-Art/Animation-

Wuzzywizard
